fungible.translation[0].definitions[0].d: fungible things can be exchanged for another amount of the same thing, or used instead of another thing
fungible.translation[0].definitions[0].e: External PC and Mac modems are generally fungible, swapping them usually requires new cables.
fungible.translation[0].definitions[1].d: if one amount of money, bonds, shares etc is fungible with another, they are of the same type and can exchanged for each other, and treated in exactly the same way
fungible.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The inability to offer securities within the US that are genuinely fungible with the same securities offered elsewhere limits the opportunities available to issuers.
